TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Button extends System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase implements class System.Windows.Forms.IButtonControl
Public Class Button Inherits ButtonBase Implements IButtonControl
public ref class Button : System::Windows::Forms::ButtonBase, System::Windows::Forms::IButtonControl

summary.span: 表示 Windows 按钮控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows button control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可通过单击按钮有焦点的情况下使用鼠标、 ENTER 键或空格键。A can be clicked by using the mouse, ENTER key, or SPACEBAR if the button has focus. 设置或属性以允许用户通过按 ENTER 或 ESC 键，即使按钮有焦点单击一个按钮。Set the or property of a to allow users to click a button by pressing the ENTER or ESC keys even if the button does not have focus. 这样，窗体的对话框中的行为。This gives the form the behavior of a dialog box. 当显示窗体使用方法，你可以使用的按钮以指定的返回值的属性。When you display a form using the method, you can use the property of a button to specify the return value of . 你可以更改按钮的外观。You can change the button's appearance. 例如，使其看起来平面 Web 了解有关的信息，请设置属性。For example, to make it appear flat for a Web look, set the property to . 属性还可以设置为，后者显示平面的直到鼠标指针经过按钮; 然后按钮获得标准的 Windows 按钮外观。The property can also be set to , which appears flat until the mouse pointer passes over the button; then the button takes on the standard Windows button appearance. > [!NOTE] > 如果具有焦点的控件接受并处理 ENTER 键按键，不处理它。If the control that has focus accepts and processes the ENTER key press, the does not process it. 例如，如果为多行或另一个按钮有焦点，控件处理而不是接受按钮按下 ENTER 键。For example, if a multiline or another button has focus, that control processes the ENTER key press instead of the accept button. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，设置其属性，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a , sets its property to , and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic Button.Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.Button Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Button.Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.Button Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Button.Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.Button Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下不显示标题。By default the displays no caption. 若要指定的标题文本，设置属性。To specify the caption text, set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，设置其属性`OK`值，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a , sets its property to the `OK` value of , and adds it to a . span.span: Gets a on the base class when creating a window.

value.span: 创建窗口时基类的一个 。

span.span: A object on the base class when creating a window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承类可以重写此属性以添加额外的功能，但必须首先调用基本类，以验证该控件将继续正常工作的构造函数。Inheriting classes can override this property to add extra functionality, but must first call the constructor on the base class to verify that the control continues to work correctly.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult DialogResult { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property DialogResult As DialogResult

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值在单击按钮时返回到父窗体。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is returned to the parent form when the button is clicked.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性将设置为任何内容而`None`，如果通过显示了父窗体和方法，单击按钮关闭了父窗体，而无需任何事件挂钩。If the for this property is set to anything other than `None`, and if the parent form was displayed through the method, clicking the button closes the parent form without your having to hook up any events. 窗体的属性设置为时单击该按钮的按钮。The form's property is then set to the of the button when the button is clicked. 例如，若要创建"是/否/取消"对话框中，只需添加三个按钮并设置其属性设置为`Yes`， `No`，和`Cancel`。For example, to create a "Yes/No/Cancel" dialog box, simply add three buttons and set their properties to `Yes`, `No`, and `Cancel`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，设置其属性`OK`，并将其添加到。The following code example creates a , sets its property to `OK`, and adds it to a . [!code-cpp[Classic Button.Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.Button Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Button.Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.Button Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Button.Button Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.Button Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DoubleClick As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户双击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，和样式位将设置为`false`为控件，与不会引发事件。By default, the and style bits are set to `false` for the control, and the event is not raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`Button1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Button1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#137](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#137)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#137](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#137)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDoubleClick As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户使用鼠标双击 控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks the control with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，和样式位将设置为`false`为控件，与不会引发事件。By default, the and style bits are set to `false` for the control, and the event is not raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`Button1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Button1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#138](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#138)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#138](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#138)]

param.name: value
param.span: 如果该按钮要具有默认按钮的外观，则值为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the button is to have the appearance of the default button; otherwise, .

summary.span: 通知 是否是默认按钮，以便它能够相应地调整自己的外观。

span.span: Notifies the whether it is the default button so that it can adjust its appearance accordingly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由父窗体，以通知调用，它应设置为默认按钮，并允许它以相应地调整其外观。This method is called by the parent form to notify the that it should be set as the default button and to allow it to adjust its appearance accordingly. 通常，为窗体的默认按钮的按钮具有比其他按钮的边框是加粗窗体上。Typically, a button that is the default button for a form has a thicker border than other buttons on the form. 调用方法仅绘制作为默认按钮的按钮; 它不会更改其行为。Calling the method only draws the button as a default button; it does not change its behavior. 若要使该按钮的行为类似于默认按钮，必须将它分配给属性。To make the button behave like a default button, it must be assigned to the property of the .

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法。

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PerformClick() cil managed

span.span: Generates a event for a button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以调用此方法来引发事件。This method can be called to raise the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例生成事件上交替的另一个按钮的事件。The following code example generates a event of a on alternating events of another button. 此代码假定两个控件已实例化窗体上，并将成员变量命名为`myVar`已声明为类中的 32 位带符号整数。This code assumes that two controls have been instantiated on a form and that a member variable named `myVar` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer within the class. [!code-cpp[Classic Button.PerformClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.PerformClick Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Button.PerformClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.PerformClick Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Button.PerformClick Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Button.PerformClick Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
